data.description: Who We Are: Bandwidth, a prior “Best of EC” award winner, is a global software company that helps enterprises deliver exceptional experiences through voice, messaging, and emergency services. Reaching 65+ countries and over 90 percent of the global economy, we're the only provider offering an owned communications cloud that delivers advanced automation, AI integrations, global reach, and premium human support. Bandwidth is trusted for mission-critical communications by the Global 2000, hyperscalers, and SaaS builders! At Bandwidth, your music matters when you are part of the BAND. We celebrate differences and encourage BANDmates to be their authentic selves. #jointheband What We Are Looking For: We’re looking for a driven and inquisitive Software Development Intern for Summer 2026 for the Numbers API team, who is hungry for real-world experience on a team that builds highly scalable and reliable software services. We’re seeking somebody who loves building things, loves learning things, and aspires to be a great engineer in the future. Ideally, we’ll find somebody who comes back to work with us full time upon graduation. What You'll Do: Write quality code Experience first hand what it’s like to be a member of an elite software development team Be a member of our Numbers API team, collaborating with our engineers to build new microservices using AWS technologies Participate in building and releasing new Numbers features Advance your skills as a software engineer What You Need: Working towards a Bachelors degree in Computer Science or an equivalent course of study 0-3 years of experience in Java, or a related programming language Excitement to be exposed to new techniques and technologies Interest or experience with public clouds like AWS A great attitude and hunger for learning The Whole Person Promise: At Bandwidth, we’re pretty proud of our corporate culture, which is rooted in our “Whole Person Promise.” We promise all employees that they can have meaningful work AND a full life, and we provide a work environment geared toward enriching your body, mind, and spirit. How do we do that? Well… Are you ready for an awesome internship experience? At Bandwidth we’re all about making your time with us fun and fulfilling! Take a break with our 90-minute workout lunch to energize your day, or roll up your sleeves for some cool volunteer activities that give back to our community. You'll also get to meet and connect with our leaders who can share their wisdom and advice. And let’s not forget the fun social activities to bond with your fellow interns! Join us for a summer full of learning, laughter, and new experiences—let’s make some great memories together! Are you excited about the position and its responsibilities, but not sure if you’re 100% qualified? Do you feel you can work to help us crush the mission? If you answered ‘yes’ to both of these questions, we encourage you to apply! You won’t want to miss the opportunity to be a part of the BAND. Applicant Privacy Notice
requirements: Experience first hand what it’s like to be a member of an elite software development team
Working towards a Bachelors degree in Computer Science or an equivalent course of study
0-3 years of experience in Java, or a related programming language
Interest or experience with public clouds like AWS
